## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMRotationRate] structure contains data specifying the device’s rate of rotation around three axes. The value of this property contains a measurement of gyroscope data whose bias has been removed by Core Motion algorithms. The identically name property of [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMGyroData], on the other hand, gives the raw data from the gyroscope. The structure type is declared in `CMGyroData.h`.

# rotationRate

**Instance Property**

The rotation rate of the device.

## Declaration

```swift
var rotationRate: CMRotationRate { get }
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMRotationRate] structure contains data specifying the device’s rate of rotation around three axes. The value of this property contains a measurement of gyroscope data whose bias has been removed by Core Motion algorithms. The identically name property of [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMGyroData], on the other hand, gives the raw data from the gyroscope. The structure type is declared in `CMGyroData.h`.

## Getting Attitude and Rotation Rate

- **attitude**: The attitude of the device.
title: rotationRate
